name: Way Back Home (Demo)
description:
Way Back Home is a kinetic novel that tells a story about a young man who contemplates his life, and goes back to the past in search for his own future.

Will he be able to achieve it?

Or perhaps he will find... something more?

The game is currently in development, hence the "demo", but it will be available for free once it's finished for everyone to enjoy.

(Check out the Development Logs for more details.)

But if you'll like to support us in our development, you can do so here or consider dropping by to our Ko-fi.

We'll be eternally grateful. ❤️
